lead_paragraph: A report by The Associated Press in some editions on Sunday about the Major League Soccer tie between the Red Bulls and the New England Revolution misstated, in some copies, the amount of time missed by striker Juan Pablo Ángel of the Red Bulls when he aggravated a hamstring strain. It was the entire second half, not the final 30 minutes. The article also misidentified the player who committed the foul that led to a direct free kick for the Revolution that tied the game at 1-1. It was Chris Leitch, not Jeff Parke.
